isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - FORWARD REAR AXLE HOUSING, REPLACE

wtsproc.config: Vehicle has air brakes and air ride suspension.

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Raise vehicle. Support rear of vehicle with frame stands.
Remove both axle shafts and gaskets on axle being serviced.
Cage brakes on axle being serviced.
Back-off brakes on axle being serviced.
Remove both wheel hub assemblies to include remove wheel bearing lock nuts, washers, bearings and wheel seals.
Drain fluid on axle being serviced.
Remove second section of front drive shaft. Disconnect drive shaft connecting axle at front axle output yoke. Secure shaft out of way for access.
Remove both sets of brake shoes from axle being serviced for access.
Remove both brake slack adjusters and brake s-cams on axle being serviced.

note.para: On this procedure the complete brake assembly was taken apart because the torque rods were seized to the spring mount pad. If the torque rods are not seized, remove torque rods. Remove / install brake spider plates and brake chamber as one unit.

step1.para: Disconnect air lines from brake chambers. Remove brake chambers with cam support brackets from brake spiders on axle being serviced.
Remove both brake spiders.
Disconnect air line from differential inter-lock. Disconnect quick release valve with mount bracket from differential. Secure out of way.
Remove all bolts retaining differential carrier to axle housing except two.
Secure transmission jack to differential carrier.
Remove two remaining bolts retaining differential carrier. Remove carrier from axle housing.
Remove differential carrier from transmission jack.
Secure transmission jack to axle housing.
Remove bolts / nuts retaining torque rods. Remove all (3) torque arms.
Remove all spring / axle housing u-bolts.
Remove axle housing from vehicle.

note.para: It may be necessary to raise vehicle to remove axle housing.

step1.para: Remove bolts retaining differential carrier thru-shaft. Remove shaft assembly.
Transfer necessary fittings / plugs to new axle housing.
Install new axle housing to transmission jack. Secure housing to jack.
Clean all necessary parts. Check wheel bearings.
Install differential carrier thru-shaft. Torque bolts to spec. Include apply sealant to mating surface.
Install axle housing in position.
Install spring u-bolts. Torque to spec.
Install axle housing torque rods. Torque to spec.
Remove transmission jack from axle housing.
Install differential carrier to transmission jack. Secure carrier to jack.
Apply sealant to carrier mating surfaces.
Install differential carrier to axle housing. Torque bolts to spec.
Remove transmission jack from carrier.
Install brake spiders. Torque to spec.
Install brake chambers and cam support brackets. Torque to spec.
Install s-cams and slack adjusters.
Install all air lines and valve.
Install brake shoes.
Install both drive shafts. Torque to spec.
Install inner wheel bearings and new wheel seals.
Install wheel / hub assemblies. Torque wheel bearings to spec.
Uncage spring brake chambers.
Adjust brakes on axle being serviced.
Install axle shafts with new gaskets. Torque to spec.
Fill differential housing to proper level.
Remove frame stands.
Remove wheel chocks.
Road test vehicle and check for leaks.
